name: Oscillatron: Alien Frequency
description: Oscillatron: Alien Frequency - music arcade in space! You have to control the spaceship and destroy the alien troops, and music will be your weapon!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2GHz Dual-core CPU Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 1Gb DirectX 9.0c compatible DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 150 MB available space
